title: AVRYai AI Receptionist Platform
description: B2B SaaS voice AI receptionist platform that handles inbound business calls, messaging workflows, and calendar scheduling.
highlights: Designed a multi-service architecture with a voice gateway and API backend
Integrated telephony, calendar, SMS, and billing providers into one workflow
Shipped containerized services for cloud deployment
challenges: Coordinating real-time call events across multiple external APIs
Maintaining reliability across async voice, scheduling, and messaging flows

title: Betty Sports Betting Research Platform
description: Real-time data aggregation and scoring engine for evaluating betting opportunities across sportsbooks and prediction markets.
highlights: Built multi-source ingestion from websocket and REST market feeds
Implemented a weighted scoring engine with configurable factors
Structured historical tracking with database models and migrations
challenges: Normalizing heterogeneous odds and market data in real time
Balancing ingestion latency with scoring consistency

title: Chatty Multi-Interface LLM Client
description: Monorepo chat platform with web, API, and CLI interfaces for model interaction and conversation export.
highlights: Built separate web UI, REST/SSE API, and terminal CLI in one workspace
Implemented conversation history and export endpoints
Used Prisma migrations with containerized local Postgres
challenges: Keeping behavior consistent across web and CLI interaction layers
Managing monorepo tooling and local developer experience

title: AVRYai Sales Copilot
description: Real-time assistant that transcribes sales conversations and generates next-response suggestions during live calls.
highlights: Built streaming pipeline from captured audio to transcript to suggestion
Implemented low-latency suggestion loop with rolling context
Delivered overlay UX for in-call guidance
challenges: Handling live audio capture and streaming constraints
Controlling response quality under strict real-time latency

title: Beary Trading Dashboard
description: Kraken-style trading command center with live bot monitoring, charts, order book, and analytics views.
highlights: Developed full-stack dashboard with real-time data channels
Implemented backend fallbacks for resilience during data-source outages
Organized services for local and containerized execution
challenges: Presenting fast-moving market data without UI instability
Blending mock and live modes for reliable development

title: AVRYai Admin Dashboard
description: Operational dashboard for authentication, lead tracking, and SMS conversation management.
highlights: Created authenticated dashboard flows with client-side routing
Implemented periodic refresh patterns for active operational data
Shipped responsive UI for desktop and mobile use
challenges: Maintaining usability while handling high-volume conversation data
Coordinating optimistic UI behavior with API refresh cycles
